meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to push or be assertive in a forceful manner.
meanings.sent1: The pushier salesman kept insisting on selling me more products.
meanings.sent2: She became pushier as the negotiation went on, trying to get her point across.
meanings.sent3: The pushier squirrel in the park always managed to grab the biggest acorns.
meanings.sent4: His pushier attitude towards deadlines made him stand out in the team.
meanings.sent5: The pushier waves crashed against the shore, eroding the sand away.
